project_plan.name: Weather Fetching CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a specified city using a public weather API and displays the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Research and select a suitable public weather API
Implement functionality to fetch weather data for a given city
Parse the response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement a user interface to accept the city name as input
Display the fetched weather information in the terminal
Write tests for each of the features implemented above, including input validation tests
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
